valuesPreferenceDescription.value: Shows values on graph axes, reference line, "Slope of Tangent", and "Net Signed Area".

predictPreferenceDescription.value: Adds a mode that allows you to predict f of {{variable}}.

screenButtonsHelpText.value: Manipulate a graph and explore its first derivative curve in real time.
Manipulate a graph and explore its integral curve in real time.
Manipulate a graph and explore its first derivative and integral curves, with or without discontinuities.
Manipulate a graph and explore its integral, first derivative, and second derivative curves, with or without discontinuities.

accessibleHelpText.value: Show or hide grid lines on all graphs.
Smooth sharp corners and discontinuities on curve in Primary Graph Area.

accessibleContextResponsePrimaryCurve.value: f of {$variable} and all curves smoothed.

accessibleHelpText.value: Reset curve to y equals zero, maintain curve manipulation settings.

accessibleContextResponsePrimaryCurve.value: f of {$variable} and all curves reset, settings unchanged.

accessibleContextResponsePredictCurve.value: Prediction curve reset, other curves and settings unchanged.

accessibleHelpText.value: Undo most recent curve manipulation.

accessibleContextResponsePrimaryCurve.value: Last manipulation removed from f of {$variable} and all curves.

accessibleContextResponsePredictCurve.value: Last manipulation removed from prediction curve only.

accessibleName.value:
{ $graph ->
  [integral] Integral Curve Visibility
  [primary] Primary Curve Visibility
  [firstDerivative] First Derivative Curve Visibility
  *[secondDerivative] Second Derivative Curve Visibility
}

accessibleHelpText.value: Show or hide curve to support predictions.

accessibleName.value:
{ $graph ->
  [integral] Zoom In Integral y Axis
  [firstDerivative] Zoom In First Derivative y Axis
  *[secondDerivative] Zoom In Second Derivative y Axis
}

accessibleHelpText.value: Zoom in y axis only.

accessibleName.value:
{ $graph ->
  [integral] Zoom Out Integral y Axis
  [firstDerivative] Zoom Out First Derivative y Axis
  *[secondDerivative] Zoom Out Second Derivative y Axis
}

accessibleHelpText.value: Zoom out y axis only.
Add or remove Tangent Tool.
Add or remove Reference Line.
Add or remove Area Under Curve Tool and shading under curve bounded by horizontal axis and f.
Choose variable for horizontal axis.
Label horizontal axis with x.
Label horizontal axis with t.
Choose derivative notation.
Use apostrophes for derivatives.
Show derivative as ratio of change in y with respect to {$variable}.
Choose how to display discontinuities in curves.
Leave gap between discontinuities.
Connect discontinuities with dashed line.
Adds a mode that allows you to predict f of {$variable}.
Adjust width of curve manipulation shape. Width ranges from {$min} to {$max} {$variable} axis units.
Choose shape to add to curve in Primary Graph Area.
Add smooth hill to curve.
Add rigid tent shape to curve.
Add pedestal with smooth corners to curve.
Add parabolic shape bounded by horizontal axis to curve.
Add up to 3 and a half periods to curve.
Freely draw curve with discontinuities likely.
Tilt curve diagonally while pinned at left edge of horizontal axis.
Shift entire curve up or down.
Choose which set of Graph Areas to investigate and find relationships.
Explore Integral at top, Primary at bottom.

accessibleName.value: Primary and First Derivative Graph Areas

accessibleHelpText.value: Explore Primary at top, First Derivative at bottom.

accessibleName.value: Integral, Primary, and First Derivative Graph Areas

accessibleHelpText.value: Explore Integral at top, Primary in center, First Derivative at bottom.

accessibleName.value: Primary, First Derivative, and Second Derivative Graph Areas

accessibleHelpText.value: Explore Primary at top, First Derivative in center, Second Derivative at bottom.

accessibleHelpTextCollapsed.value: Explore slope of line tangent to f of {$variable} at {$variable} coordinate of Tangent tool.

accessibleParagraph.value: At {$variable} equals {$x}, slope of line tangent to f of {$variable} equals {$firstDerivativeValue}.

accessibleHelpTextCollapsed.value: Explore net signed area under f of {$variable} curve between {$variable} equals 0 and {$variable} coordinate of Area Under Curve tool.

accessibleParagraph.value: Net signed area under f of {$variable} curve equals {$integralValue} between {$variable} equals 0 and {$variable} equals {$x}.

accessibleHelpText.value: Choose curve to manipulate in Primary Graph Area.
Manipulate f of {$variable} in Primary Graph Area.
Manipulate prediction curve to predict f of {$variable} based on other graphs.
Show or hide f of {$variable} concurrent with prediction curve.

Move vertical line horizontally to change {$variable} value and explore relationship between visible line tangent to f of {$variable} and coordinates of dot on first derivative curve. Vertical line passes through all graphs at same {$variable} value. Information provides current {$variable} value, slope of tangent line, and y coordinate of dot on first derivative curve.
Move vertical line horizontally to change {$variable} value and explore y values on all graphs. Vertical line passes through all graphs at same {$variable} value.

Move vertical line horizontally to change {$variable} value and explore relationship between cumulative net signed area under f from left and coordinates of dot on integral curve. Area is bounded by {$variable} axis and f curve. Vertical line passes through all graphs at same {$variable} value. Information provides current {$variable} value, y coordinate of dot on integral curve, and total net signed area under f curve.
Manipulate f of {$variable} to explore changes to all graphs. Use keyboard shortcuts if needed.
Manipulate curve to predict f of {$variable} based on other curves. Use keyboard shortcuts if needed.
Choose action to take on curve in Primary Graph Area.
